channel.name: CBC Yellowknife CA
channel.title: Live: NHL Hockey
channel.desc: The Maple Leafs try to slay their ghosts in Game 7 of the East semifinal with the Panthers. Toronto stayed alive with a resolute 2-0 Game 6 victory in Florida. Auston Matthews (TOR) broke a 0-0 tie with a third-period goal, his first of the series.
